title: Eco-Chic Studio with Country Tranquility and Modern Comfort
description: Discover sustainable living in this thoughtfully designed, wheelchair-accessible studio in Dyrekcja, Chelm. Offering 37 sqm of expertly used space, it features an open-plan sleeping and living area, a sleek modern bathroom, and access to a well-equipped laundry room. Residents can take advantage of a private onsite swimming pool, making relaxation attainable every day. Impeccable, move-in-ready interiors with eco-conscious finishes set this unique home apart.
neighborhood_description: Dyrekcja is Chelm’s hidden gem, blending rustic historic charm with positive energy and a youthful, creative vibe. Experience unbeatable highway access, perfect for commuters or those who enjoy spontaneous getaways. Shopping and dining options nearby mean modern convenience partners with the peaceful surroundings to create a balanced lifestyle.
lifestyle_benefits: green scenery for walking and inspiration
target_buyer: Ideal for remote workers who crave tranquility without sacrificing style or amenities; an individual or young couple seeking flexible work-from-home options within a lively yet quiet neighborhood.
market_positioning: A modern, accessible studio set apart by its eco-conscious focus and creative styling, competitive within its price segment and unrivalled among comparable homes for remote-enabled lifestyles in Chelm's charming Dyrekcja district.
